titles: Miscellany essays upon philosophy, history, poetry, morality, humanity, gallantry &c. / by Monsieur de St. Evremont ; done into English by Mr. Brown.
author: Saint-Evremond, 1613-1703.

publisher: Printed for John Everingham and Abell Roper,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
